article: george w. bush 's outsized , $ ##.# million campaign war chest , more money than any candidate has raised so early in any presidential election season , was the driving subject of conversation thursday among candidates and political experts who said it would have an inevitable impact on his competitors and reshape the landscape of campaign finance for the #### election .
